DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Displays global configuration for tacacs servers. Global parameters are considered if a particular server is not configured with that parameter.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use the show command to display tacacs server global parameters.

COMMAND.name: show tacacs-server host

PARAM.name: address
PARAM.help: IP address of the tacacs server

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Displays configured properties of tacacs server(s).
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use the command to display properties of tacacs server(s). Use IP address of the server, to display particular server's configuration. If nothing is specified, displays all the servers.

COMMAND.name: tacacs-server source-ip
COMMAND.help: Configure global source ip for TACACS

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Specify an IP address is used as the source IP address for user authentication with a TACACS+ server in CONFIGURATION mode. By default, no source ip address is configured as the IP address of the interface from which a packet is sent to a TACACS+ server is used as source IP in the packet.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Configure a valid v4 or v6 address as source IP in config mode.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configuring global source ip to communicate with tacacs server

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# configure sonic(config)# tacacs-server source-ip A.B.C.D/A::B sonic(config)# tacacs-server source-ip 1.2.3.4

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the global timeout used to wait for an authentication response from TACACS+ servers in CONFIGURATION mode, from 1 to 60 seconds; the default is 5.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Configure global timeout value in config mode.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configuring global timeout to wait for response from tacacs server

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# configure sonic(config)# tacacs-server timeout seconds timeout (default: 5) (0..60) sonic(config)# tacacs-server timeout 10

COMMAND.name: tacacs-server auth-type
COMMAND.help: Configure global authentication type for TACACS

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the global authentication method to be used to communicate with TACACS+ servers in CONFIGURATION mode. Default is 'pap'.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Configure authentication method in configure mode.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configuring global authentication method to use to communicate with tacacs server

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# configure sonic(config)# tacacs-server auth-type pap chap mschap sonic(config)# tacacs-server auth-type chap

COMMAND.name: tacacs-server key
COMMAND.help: Configure global shared secret for TACACS

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the global secret key to be used to authenticate with TACACS+ servers in CONFIGURATION mode.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Configure secret key of 32 characters length to be used in authenticating tacacs server.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configuring global secret key to authenticate tacacs server

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# configure sonic(config)# tacacs-server key (Valid Chars: [0-9A-Za-z], Max Len: 32) shared secret sonic(config)# tacacs-server key mykey

COMMAND.name: tacacs-server host
COMMAND.ACTION: python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-tacacs.py patch_tacacs_server ${host} port:${port-val} key:${key-val} timeout:${timeout-val} authtype:${type-val} priority:${priority-val}

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure a TACACS+ authentication server in CONFIGURATION mode. Re-enter the tacacs-server host command multiple times to configure more than one TACACS+ server. If configured multiple TACACS+ servers, attempts to connect in the order they were configured. A sonic switch connects with the configured TACACS+ servers one at a time, until a TACACS+ server responds with an accept or reject response.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Configure a tacacs server for authentication in config mode. Default value of Port is 49. Default value of Priority is 1. Default value of timeout is 5. Default value of Type is chap.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# configure sonic(config)# tacacs-server host 3.3.3.3 port 30 timeout 30 key mykey type mschap priority 30 sonic(config)# tacacs-server host 4.4.4.4

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Delete a configured tacacs host. The command takes ip address of the host.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# configure sonic(config)# no tacacs-server host A.B.C.D/A::B server ip address sonic(config)# no tacacs-server host 3.3.3.3
